review: not working on w11

its a low effort port not enhanced at all they didnt redo the textures or up the polygon count or anything of course the original was a good game so it would still be worth it if it worked at all currently the game cant start unless you download a community patch from a github page   even then you wont be able to play it because it wont recognize your controller even if you have steam emulate it as a keyboard the game is completely detached from any input method

i needed the dll from here httpsgithubcomelishaclouddinputto8 to get the game to launch but once i put this dll in the game directory it worked fine  the great high speed fun game you remember and i still love it
